title: The Queen's Awards for Enterprise - Sustainable Development

details.body: This annual award recognises companies which have integrated environmental, social, economic and management aspects of sustainable development into their business.
details.short_description: Recognises commercially successful products, services and approaches to management which might benefit the environment, society and the wider economy
details.eligibility: Businesses must be based in the UK and employ at least 2 full-time employees.
details.evaluation:
Businesses may enter to be evaluated on:

  • outstanding achievement over a period of 2 years or more
  • continuous achievement over a period of 5 years or more
details.additional_information:
Achievements should be in some or all of the following:

  • the invention, design, and production of goods
  • the performance of services
  • the marketing, distribution and after sale support of goods or services
  • the management of resources and relationships with people or organisations
